p: Evaluation of the effect of CR and CL oils on protein, carbohydrates, and inulin contents of stored JA tubers in the presence or absence of P. polonicum stress infection was detected ( Figure 12). Over the 2 months of storage, the untreated-infected treatment showed a fast degradation of protein, carbohydrates, and inulin contents, which positively correlated with the progress of the storage period.
